fn.p: NRF, ECS, MLN and conceived the study and its design; JGJ, KRD, FCSS, IMC, and ACT conducted laboratory experiments, generation of sequences and primary analysis; DSC and SCH designed and tested the primer scheme; NJL and JT designed and performed base calling and consensus generation; ACF and AFNR were responsible for clinical sample and data management; TLD, ALA, JHRC, MCRSC and WKO conducted public health data management; NRF and DCS and conducted the phylogenetic analyses; JGJ, CMR, AMBF, CT, OGP and NRF performed interpretation of the results and writing of the manuscript. All authors read and approved the manuscript. The authors declare no conflict of interests.
